name: powerplatformtip
description: PowerPlatformTip - Build tools for CSS/JS optimization

scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o assets/css/custom-components.min.css assets/css/custom-components.css && cleancss -o assets/css/performance.min.css assets/css/performance.css && cleancss -o assets/css/mobile-navigation.min.css assets/css/mobile-navigation.css
scripts.minify:js: uglifyjs assets/js/performance.js -o assets/js/performance.min.js -c -m && uglifyjs assets/js/mobile-navigation.js -o assets/js/mobile-navigation.min.js -c -m
scripts.dev: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.production: npm run build:css && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js

author: Marcel Lehmann
